channel.title: Combatscape Help!
channel.description: Hey i am somewhat new to this but i have the combatscape client and source downloaded and i can open it and play it myself but i wann aknow how i can put it online so that others can join and play with me ... (no im not leaching it) i will recode and put updayes on it but i need help . ok so far i have port fowarded my router and i have downloaded the no-ip and i made a no-ip host but idk what to do from there please help...

item.title: Combatscape Help!
item.dc:creator: @bblind59 bblind59
item.description:
@bblind59 wrote:

S E R B:

Have a friend test to see if he can log in so that ur sure that others can log into it and not just you and then advertise it on the moparscape status page.

ok so i did this and me and my friend still cant log on … i ever changed the server ip thing under the client gui files then i compiled it ran server and sent the client files and all 2 my friend and he stil lcouldnt log in it gave the error message …

Read full topic
